description: High Level Summary of Performance Data

targets.query: SELECT last("lookup_time_ms") AS "$DNS_TARGET1" FROM "wiperf-dns" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$WLANPi$/ AND "dns_target" =~ /^$DNS_TARGET1$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(5m) fill(null)
SELECT last("lookup_time_ms") AS "$DNS_TARGET1" FROM "wiperf-dns" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$WLANPi$/ AND "dns_target" =~ /^$DNS_TARGET1$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(5m) fill(null)
SELECT last("lookup_time_ms") AS "$DNS_TARGET1" FROM "wiperf-dns" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$WLANPi$/ AND "dns_target" =~ /^$DNS_TARGET1$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(5m) fill(null)
SELECT last("lookup_time_ms") AS "$DNS_TARGET1" FROM "wiperf-dns" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$WLANPi$/ AND "dns_target" =~ /^$DNS_TARGET1$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(5m) fill(null)
SELECT last("lookup_time_ms") AS "$DNS_TARGET1" FROM "wiperf-dns" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$WLANPi$/ AND "dns_target" =~ /^$DNS_TARGET1$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(5m) fill(null)
SELECT "rtt_avg_ms" AS "${PING_TARGET1}" FROM "wiperf-ping" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$WLANPi$/) AND ("ping_index"=1) AND $timeFilter
SELECT "rtt_avg_ms" AS "${PING_TARGET2}" FROM "wiperf-ping" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$WLANPi$/) AND ("ping_index"=2) AND $timeFilter
SELECT "rtt_avg_ms" AS "${PING_TARGET3}" FROM "wiperf-ping" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$WLANPi$/) AND ("ping_index"=3) AND $timeFilter
SELECT "rtt_avg_ms" AS "${PING_TARGET4}" FROM "wiperf-ping" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$WLANPi$/) AND ("ping_index"=4) AND $timeFilter
SELECT "rtt_avg_ms" AS "${PING_TARGET5}" FROM "wiperf-ping" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$WLANPi$/) AND ("ping_index"=5) AND $timeFilter

title: 01 - Probe Summary
